thread.section_title: Hotel Eclat Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Striving the excellence
thread.title_full: Striving the excellence - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Rodica18
title: Striving the excellence
text:
Eclat Hotel is more than a Hotel. It is culture, it is pleasure, it is a moment of beautiful life.
I highly recommend Eclat Hotel to the people looking for a exclusiv place to enjoy relaxing and unforgetable moments surrounded by art on its best expression.
The people is profesional and agreables and we must meet Chris or Louis and spend with them few minnuts . You will be pleased by the conversation and their attention.
